description:
Needs to monitor your time either at work or at home, so try WorkingTime. Create Categories, Clients and projects (with sub projects). Logging can be active for a single project or multiple projects. Optionally log notes as you start or stop a project. Produce pie charts and reports by week, day, and month or for a date range. Report on a complete project, client or category. Set a cost per Project/sub-project and these can display on the reports. Email reports or upload to Google docs. Backup and restore database to Google docs.

WorkingTime is the full HP Touchpad version of TimeKeeper by BlurApps.  You can event restore a TimeKeeper backup from Google Docs into WorkingTime.

The Lite version has all of the features of the full version except you can only have 1 Client, 2 Categories and 4 Projects.  These is no Restore from Google Docs, Exhibition mode and you have less options for report rounding.

Some of the enhancements over TimeKeeper include:

•	New Tab based layout.
•	Main Activity Tab shows Project selection and a current activity section with a min-graph.
•	Clearing activity records before a selected date. 
•	Color Schemes 
•	Client information and linking clients to projects. Producing the standard reports for a selection of clients is currently being added. 
•	Projects have ability to have optional start date, required completion date, project completed date, producing mini-progress bars against the project.
•	 Detailed Notes that can be entered when starting or stopping an activity or changed via activity maintenance.
